Package src.main

Class ResizableArrayStack<T>

java.lang.Object
src.main.ResizableArrayStack<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
StackInterface<T>
public final class ResizableArrayStack<T> extends Object implements StackInterface<T>
A class of stacks whose entries are stored in an array.

    • push

      public void push(T newEntry)
      Adds a new entry to the top of the stack
      Specified by:
      push in interface StackInterface<T>
      Parameters:
      newEntry - An object to be added to the stack. Throws an exception if the stack is not initialized or if this push would result the stack exceeding its predefined capacity

    • ensureCapacity

      private void ensureCapacity()
      If the stack is full, then double its size. Throw exception if the required capacity is more than the predefine MAX_CAPACITY

      Checks if the desired capacity is higher than the predefined MAX_CAPACITY
      Parameters:
